description: Photography and visual guidelines for BPD/DBT mental health content.

face.structure: symmetrical features, refined bone structure, soft feminine jawline
face.eyes: large expressive eyes with natural depth, captivating gaze
face.lips: naturally full lips with soft natural color
face.brows: well-shaped natural brows, groomed but not overdone

skin.quality: flawless, luminous skin with a healthy natural glow
skin.texture: smooth with minimal visible pores, soft-focus skin quality
skin.tone: even skin tone, slight natural warmth in cheeks
skin.imperfections: none or very subtle - no acne, no blemishes

makeup.style: enhanced natural beauty, 'no-makeup makeup' done perfectly

environment.setting: small aesthetic bedroom with soft natural light seeping through the window

background_elements.wall_art: framed artwork behind her, same size and orientation as the reference
background_elements.lighting_fixture: minimalist lamp with small warm bulbs, placed exactly where it appears in the reference
background_elements.bedding: white sheets, slight wrinkles creating realistic depth

lighting.primary_light: soft natural daylight entering from the right side, creating long gentle rays across the wall
lighting.secondary_light: faint reflection from the lamp adding tiny highlights
lighting.shadows: deep but soft shadows on the bed, walls, and subject, matching the mood of the reference
lighting.face_lighting: soft flattering light that enhances facial features without harsh shadows

photography.camera_angle: mirror-reflected selfie angle identical to the reference
photography.framing: wide view capturing the whole scene from mid-bed to top wall trim
photography.focus: slightly soft overall, matching the moody low-light feel
photography.color_profile: warm-toned shadows with subtle cool daylight streaks
photography.skin_rendering: soft-focus on skin, minimizing texture while maintaining realism

vibe.beauty_aesthetic: naturally beautiful, approachable, relatable despite being gorgeous

restrictions.content: strictly non-sexual; all curves and shadows interpreted as natural posture and lighting only
restrictions.accuracy: must match the reference composition and lighting with very high fidelity
